website_summaries.verdict: From jeans to dress pants, chances are these comfortable loafers will earn you praise for their simplistic good looks.
pros: These driving loafers are practical for work and play
Comfortable enough for long walks or time spent on your feet
Most wearers didn't require a break-in period
cons: A few complaints of sizes running a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to wear my comfy aerosoles first day of school. Fit nice and sooo soft. Threw out box as these were a keeper! Well after three hours the toe on my left foot cracked and peeled. Looked cheap and terrible. Absolutely disappointed in the quality of my aerosoles at such a hefty price!! At this rate they should be unwearable in a week. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Loved them at first
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe minus the fact that the inserts have rolled up and falling out. Seems like the toe part wasn't glued properly. It feels horrible under the toes. Only wore them a few times around the house. Too soon for this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One month in...
customer_reviews.text: Wore them on and off for the past month and the sole is already breaking away from the shoe. The shoe repair guy said the sole is glued on and this is bound to happen again. Too late for me to return them, so they are about to go to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: paintedport

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I love Aerosoles shoes and always wear a 9. Because of my history of wearing Aerosoles, I was completely confident about buying shoes online instead of trying them on. The 9 gaped at the sides, and I walked right out of them. I reordered the 8 1/2, but they were too short in length. No luch this time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The positives are the leather is soft and does not rub against my heel. The negatives are, the soles are almost worn down and I don't even wear them that often, nor do I walk in them a lot. The stitching rubs against the top of my feet so I had to cover it with moleskin. The back of the right shoe is scuffed from driving since the soles do not extend to the back. They are ok but quite pricey for the level of quality you get. There isn't going to be a repeat buy for these.
customer_reviews.author: tmpinsc

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe-broke in under a week
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but the sole separated from the upper after only 4 or 5 wears. I work in an office and walk to the elevator and my desk so it's not from overuse. Props to Amazon customer service for sending a new pair with no issues. Hope this was a fluke and not indicative of a big decline in aerosoles quality...
customer_reviews.author: Jmbinol

customer_reviews.title: I do love these; they are very classy looking with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I do love these; they are very classy looking with a little gold in the color so they can be worn with dressier clothing. VERY COMFORTABLE TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cote

customer_reviews.title: Liked the shoe UNTIL it ripped on me
customer_reviews.text: Liked the shoe UNTIL it ripped on me. As you can see in the picture it's not a rip just along the seem. I take vary good care of my shoes. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: cps

customer_reviews.title: Slip on and say ahhhhh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to serve as "airport shoes" that would be easy to take off and put back on again while navigating security, but they're sooo comfy and beautifully made I'll be wearing them everywhere. I love the color too and overall very pleased with myself for making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 1badmini

customer_reviews.title: My Most Favorite Shoes Even
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable I have ordered them in every color available in my size. Unfortunately, 9 1/2 isn't always available. I wish I could get them in more colors. I have black, light blue and another black. Two problems with others I ordered. The white shoes with floral design are not comfy because the raised design in the inside of the heel is very scratchy. Also, my little toe went through the black suede for no reason & had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect though. They are a blush color not really ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get to wear these yet as they are at least a whole size too big. I am normally a size 8 and that’s what I ordered. I’m not sure on the quality if I should try ordering in a size 7 or look elsewhere. The color is perfect though. They are a blush color not really a light pink as the description says, which is exactly what I was hoping for. Love Aerosoles, just not sure if these will wear well, so definitely have to think and look around a little before reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie C.

customer_reviews.title: Longer and much wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoes, comfortable, great sole. Significantly longer than several other brands size 10. Length alone might have been okay but these regular width run very wide and I was walking out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of black, suede driving moccasins for forever. I'd had another pair and worn them out. I finally settled on these and wear them but I'm not impressed. They run not quite a half-size small and was hoping they'll stretch a bit, but not so far, so they probably won't. I wanted something cool and breathable and that isn't happening with these. I'm pretty sure the "suede" is fake, since it's backed by either fabric or sticky plastic depending on where it is. I trusted the name Aerosole, so I am really disappointed. They cost just under $50, so I expected them to be "real," but they're most likely not even Aerosoles.
customer_reviews.author: bookfloozy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish on trend moc
customer_reviews.text: Aerosoles is known for soft, comfortable shoes and this shoe fits the description. It is only slightly larger than "true to size" and like most driver mocs provides little to no arch or other support. Fits well around toes, rather like a glove, and because the shoe is so soft, it is comfortable. The shoe slides up slightly at the heel, but because it fits well in the toes and otherwise, a smaller size would be too small. The color is beautiful: on trend soft blush pink.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. It was much too large even though it was sold as my size. The color is lovely. When I tried to reorder in a smaller size, the price was nearly double the price. I don’t even know how that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Webb

customer_reviews.title: but I wouldn’t call them comfortable. On the plus side
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what’s going on with Aerosoles, but suddenly their shoes seem to run small. I meant to return these, but they got lost in the post-Christmas shuffle and now I’m stuck with them. They’re starting to loosen up after a few wears, but I wouldn’t call them comfortable. On the plus side, they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: DC Gal

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and looks great. Looks more like a dark cooper
customer_reviews.text: Ordered down to size 8 instead of 8.1/2. Fit is perfecy for my not so slim feet. Shoe has a comfortable footbed and a spacious toe box, without feeling tight. This shoe looks with skinny or slim jeans or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe but I wear a size 12 and ordered a black size 12 and it was a little too long. I’m ordering an 11 (had to get on wait list:-( ) but I’m keeping the 12 for the time being so I can compare. Hoping the 11 is available soon. I also ordered an 11 and a 12 in tan to compare but haven’t gotten them yet.
customer_reviews.author: zcritter007

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a solid 8.5 and these fit perfectly. I believe they are true to size. I just received these and have only worn them around the house for a while, but they feel cushiony and comfortable. I plan to wear these without socks and I don't feel any uncomfortable rubbing yet. The only downside is the suede is sure to show marks as it's pretty thin. I ordered the tan as well as navy. The tan will hide the marks better than the navy as the navy seems to have a whitish undertone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: No padding, runs large
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have the bad experience with these that other reviewers reported. Although they have absolutely zero padding. It's like walking barefoot. The leather is very soft though and did not need to be broken in. I'm almost 40 and have some feet problems but I'll just get some insoles and hope that helps because they are so cute. I wear a 6.5 in almost all shoes but they didn't have half sizes so I ordered the 7. It fits like an 8.had to exchange for a 6. Which fits like a 7. So it's a hair too large but I'm keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously! Can this show company get its sizes right? I had to return this item 3 times to get the right fit even though my shoe size is consistently the same across other brands from pumps to flats to sneakers and boots! If it weren’t for the fact that Rockport discontinued the style I like, I would never buy this brand. Spent too much time guessing my show size. Geez Louise!
customer_reviews.author: Avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, comfortable, lightweight, fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: 4 Star first impression Color: multicolor is very pretty and matches picture. Love that they will go with any color Fit: true to size. I wear 6.5/7. I got a 7 so I could wear footie socks and so they would fit during all seasons. Comfort: very lightweight and comfortable Quality: sole has more support than typical flats/cheap loafers. Fabric is very thin, so I’m concerned they may wear quickly. Will update review after multiple wears if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Arigro

customer_reviews.title: Fine like wine shoe
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful soft leather shoe. It is so comfortable it is like walking on a cloud or air. You can wear this shoe all day long and your feet will not be tired or sore. It looks very stylish with pants or dresses. Wear it with dressy attire or casual attire.
customer_reviews.author: Momond

customer_reviews.title: Wide
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these but they were too wiggly from side to side (wide). I usually wear a size 8, regular. I have never had an issue with a shoe due to width. I ordered these on Prime Wardrobe, so they went back. I kept the Naturalizer Penny Loafer and have been wearing those for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: never enough books

customer_reviews.title: Does not Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I love aerosoles. I got a new job and immediately thought I need them because I’ll be walking around again for my commute and they are office look. Ot feels like a sneaker because they are so comfy. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: jjphoenix21

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came in 100 more colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE... love at first slip on! Baby Blush Pink color nubuck and OMG its like slipping your feet into the best slipper!!! I wear a size 9 Wide and I have found it impossible to buy Wide shoes that actually fit and Medium hurts my feet. PLEASE PLEASE can you find more in my size as most are sold out. MORE NUBUCK.. awesome awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boobaleeze

customer_reviews.title: Huge shoes, probably fake Aerosoles.
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of ordering three pairs of these shoes in various colors, thinking they were "real" Aerosoles that always fit my 7 1/2 B feet perfectly. Unfortunately, these were made in China and are probably fakes. Huge shoes. At least one size larger than 7 1/2. So buyer, beware. These are not the real thing. Or if they are, then Aerosoles needs to do some quality control in their Chinese plant! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sheltiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Ssssssuper
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Very comfortable, I have a narrow foot so a bit too wide but length fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love the coloring, I wanted the size medium which was sold out in my size, so I got the wide (which I sometimes get anyway). It's a little loose now, but I figure on hot summer days, my feet swell anyway, so then it will be perfect. I love the color/design of the leather and it goes with everything. Super comfy, also.
customer_reviews.author: Sig27

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this earlier, but I'll review it again. The shoes are soooooo very comfortable and stylish. I recommend them to anyone who wants to be comfortable and stylish. You will get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBee

customer_reviews.title: Love this loafer! Just a little wide.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of loafers to wear primarily to work, and I love them so far. They are very comfortable, and there was no sort of break-in period unlike with other similar style shoes I've purchased in the past. My only complaint is that this shoe is a little wide, so just be aware of that if you have narrower feet. The wideness was a little bothersome at first, but I'm used to it now and wouldn't necessarily let that stop me from purchasing this shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Walking On Clouds!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wear these shoes all day at work with no problems! All I kept thinking as I was walking was, "It feels like I'm walking on clouds!" They were so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: A-Babs

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, soft, true to size, bright color. Love their arch support ( have the bunion issue so I am really picky about shoes).
customer_reviews.author: amica

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable, but run large
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute and comfortable and in a hard-to-find color. However, be aware that they run at least a half-size large; the seller didn't have a smaller size and wouldn't allow a return, so I'm stuck with floppy shoes that I had to stick a lot of inserts in!
customer_reviews.author: riverscircus

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So far, they fit really snug so only a stocking thickness pedi sock will work if any at all. I opted no socks. They look classy. I work in Malibu, Ca so the bar is high. I am petite tho. 5’4” 116 lbs... I ordered a 7M and it felt like a 7 (without the extra room width wise). So they run a tad small. I still think a 1/2 size larger would be too much for me. I’m happy with the 7M.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These look so good and fit so well and are so very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vaws

customer_reviews.title: All day comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes a few times a month and they are sooooo comfortable. I wear with no socks and like buttah!
customer_reviews.author: ExecSec

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit and look great, however within two wearings the rubber sole began ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit and look great, however within two wearings the rubber sole began to detach from the leather and needed to be glued back into place. A better fixative would be in order. Even so, these shoes are well worth the price and they are SOOOOO comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Peret

customer_reviews.title: Love the pink!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! I got the pink. I own quite a few Aerosole shoes and usually the 7.5 is fine. These were a bit small. I think they will stretch just enough. I don't want to go up in a suede loafer because they can sometimes lose there shape.
customer_reviews.author: Artie R.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these shoes in black 6m and they fit great. They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in black 6m and they fit great. They are very comfortable. So, I ordered the bronze in size 6m they are way to big. I would give a five star on the black as they are cute and very comfortable. Very disappointed in the sizing on the bronze pair.
customer_reviews.author: Baa Baa Bitty

customer_reviews.title: Driving Loafers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size, and they fit perfectly. Haven't worn them for an extended period of time yet, but they felt great when I did wear them. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: pglsdal

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought them as an easy shoe to wear to my office job ( i do not wear heels). These are very comfy, good price, and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Weird color
customer_reviews.text: I returned them. The color is a bit off- kind of faded greenish yellow. i ordered an 8 wide knowing they run narrow, but they sent an 8 regular. They might be very comfy if they fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Van

customer_reviews.title: do not waste time or money
customer_reviews.text: second time I am returning these shoes. I usually wear a size 6 1/2 but lately with some styes I have been wearing a size 7. First purchase a sie 7 was huge, second time size 6 1/2 is still very big. I give up, this shoe is not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scheufele

customer_reviews.title: Pink Nubuck run very large!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in tan about 7months ago and love them, they are comfortable and they look great, so when I saw the Pink Nubuck color I didn't hesitate to order them in the same size again but when they arrived they didn't fit at all! They are very wide and there is a huge gap around my instep and they fall right off my foot. Very disappointed because they look great but they just don't fit right. Returning and going to try and go down a size and hope they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels so great. I wear them often
customer_reviews.text: Feels so great. I wear them often. I ordered my size and I wear a wide as well. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: they kept gapping on the sides and I did not like the shape of them
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes. they kept gapping on the sides and I did not like the shape of them. I would have like them more round in the front, then pointy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and very comfortable as expected, though they are very slippery in wet floor
customer_reviews.author: Super Plus

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: There is no arch support and the ball of my feet hurt when wearing these! I donated them to a thrift store!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my mom and she’s loved them no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Oseida’s

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfortable, no break in time required. Aerosoles are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: ahappy65

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! I love them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Wiafe

customer_reviews.title: Pickyshopper
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes as always with aerosoles. I can wear them all day til I go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Prrfect

customer_reviews.title: COOL SHOE
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfortable. Not really a walking shoe because it is so flat. But look great. Feel good too.
customer_reviews.author: Cap47

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. So good, I bought them in several colors.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty driving moc.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but I swapped out insole for a Vionic insole for better arch support. The shoes are very soft so use care if you want them to retain look.
customer_reviews.author: Slopicco

customer_reviews.title: Felt good
customer_reviews.text: Wore them a few times noticed that the golden material is coming off in various places. I liked them until then.
customer_reviews.author: MsRRSB

customer_reviews.title: Aerosoles Women's Over Drive Slip-On Loafer
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable Gorgeous Shoe. I Don't Like Killing Animals For My Wardrobe. But These Are Nice.
customer_reviews.author: siam

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Not for people with bunions. Looks cute. Semi-comfortable. A little narrow. Well made. Overall good shoe if you like the style.
customer_reviews.author: dave stein

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit they got black marks on the front ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit they got black marks on the front and back heel when I was driving due to the color being light its noticeable do you have something that can clean this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordinarily wear 9 or 9 1/2. I ordered the same size and it was like I ordered a 7. So disappointed. I was really looking forward to wearing it!!!😠😞😠😞
customer_reviews.author: Daphney

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute and comfortable! Great for running around at work all day
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to buy this in wide, although I don't have particularly wide feet. They are so cute and comfortable! Great for running around at work all day. The cushioned insole is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Business Casual
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say it's an Aerosole. Great looking driving shoe. Perfect for business casual for those of use that choose not to wear heels!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of loafers
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and high quality! I bought two pairs. Going to purchase at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great company but size a bit off.
customer_reviews.text: I usually have good luck with this brand but this shoe seemed to run large. I returned and did not replace.
customer_reviews.author: Paula, fiber artist.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Over-Drive in Lt Tan Nubuck, its my second pair. Love the colour, it goes with most things in my cupboard. Hopefully the green colour will be available for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Ran large
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of the older version of these shoes and really like them. However, this pair ran much larger than my others.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Love these loafers
customer_reviews.text: Love these loafers. They fit like a glove and are so very comfortable. Ordered a 71/2 wide (my normal size).
customer_reviews.author: Cyndes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great moccasins for spring/summer. When sneakers just won’t do this is the shoe to turn to.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Christoulakis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever. True to size and super stylish. I have them in three colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! As s teacher.... standing the whole day...... Perfect spring shoes
customer_reviews.author: mahana

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I knew I would like these, since I have a pair of the Over Drive shoes in the striped leather. They are the most comfortable slip-ons I have ever worn. The only problem is I were them so much that the sole wears down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kami B. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shoe but not true to a size 10. Wish it came in a 10 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Good car shoe
customer_reviews.text: if you are color sensitive as I am, this is not a white-white, it has a slight grayish tinge to it. comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.author: S.S.X.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Casual shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a driving moc for awhile and so glad I found these! Perfect casual shoe!
customer_reviews.author: luvpugs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Fit is perfect. very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Get these before they sell out!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful. They are extremely comfortable and the colors are beautiful. Now my favorite pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Loved the style and look of the shoe runs LARGEI
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I opened the box but tried them on and was very disappointed these shoes seem to run almost 1 size larger. Going to return and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Glory Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great price, a bit roomy but that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin T

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, however because I have problems with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice style, however because I have problems with my foot unable to walk long distance with them. My feet cramp up. I needed more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guzman

customer_reviews.title: If you wear M, order W
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Color is a bit on the "greenish" side of yellow. I wear a size 10 Wide, but this Wide is still bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: BWB

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I wear a size 8and they fit perfect. I want to order a few more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gougon

customer_reviews.title: I love these comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these comfy shoes. Took away one star because there is no arch support so they are limited to short strolling.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne rearick

customer_reviews.title: Cheapo
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but not a lot of arch support. Seems cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Meself

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable shoe- wore it all over on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Soft upper so fit my wide foot well, very comfortable shoe- wore it all over on vacation
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I bought my normal size and they were too large. Even if they had fit, I didn’t like the way they looked on my feet. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable ever
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. No breaking in needed. It feels like I'm not wearing anything. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fah.L.P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! This is my 3rd pair (different colors!) and they are comfortable from the first moment you slip them on!
customer_reviews.author: vickit

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe. Looks just like the picture. I have a very high arch. No arch support or any support. Disappointed. They are going back. These may work if you have flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: These run a little big and one shoe had a stain on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: these shoes a super soft. Very comfortable. Wish I could find them in more colors in my size
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pisano

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe however I wear a size 11 in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe however I wear a size 11 in most women shoes ordered that and it was too large needed a 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tigner

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever, I got these in wide width
customer_reviews.author: Maria Manmohan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. A little looser in the toebox but I did order a wide width so it is expu
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Storm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pair of shoes ever. They are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very versatile. You could wear it with a cute maxi skirt or even with capris. I found it to be comfortable right out of the box. I was looking for a plain white slip on nothing with buckles or glitter etc... I'm glad I ordered it and would recommend this shoe to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joette M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever had. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but had to return and get next size up. Now I can enjoy them!

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks a bit like old lady shoes but they are very comfortable! True to size

customer_reviews.title: fit is not good. They run very large.
customer_reviews.text: runs too large and makes my feel look like boats.
customer_reviews.author: sandy pladsen

product_meta.title: Aerosoles Women's Over Drive Slip-On Loafer
product_meta.description: A great driving moc that isn’t just for driving. over drive is a perfect, easy-to-wear style with core comfort features including a memory foam footbed. classic moccasin whipstitch around a perfed suede upper is the perf-percent detail, and a nubby, scored sole offers even more comfort.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
STYLE & DESIGN:A premium driving moccasin that isn’t just for driving. Over Drive is a perfect, easy-to-wear slip-on loafer with classic moccasin whipstitch that goes all around a curved upper.
COMFORT & QUALITY:Comfort foam footbed and sumptuous padded insole to soothe and pamper your feet. Built with leather and synthetic material to provide exceptional comfort and detail.
STRONG & DURABLE:Manufactured with high quality materials and stitched with precision allowing for strong and robust inseams with sturdy and resilient soles.

ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY:You will always know an Aerosoles shoe by our unique diamond flex sole found on every pair. Our rubber composition soles with a unique diamond pattern are designed to disperse friction away from the foot.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE:You can return this item for any reason and get a full refund: no shipping charges. The item must be returned in new and unused condition.
